raw: Pablo Rivero , the owner of Don Julio , said the aim was to keep alive the atmosphere and feeling of the corner grill , or ‘ parrilla ’ - a concept that is a key part of Argentine culture and as ubiquitous and emblematic of Buenos Aires as a cafe in Paris or local London pub .
